mapper.select: SELECT form_code AS code, form_name AS formName, default_form AS defaultForm, main_form AS mainForm, form_used_status AS status, comp_id, NVL(form_explain, "") AS formExplain, default_approval_line_status AS approvalLineStatus, form_approval_kind AS approvalKind FROM form WHERE form_code=#{code};

SELECT fud.category, fud.form_code, fud.use_id, comp.comp_id, comp.comp_name AS company, est.est_id, NVL(est.est_name, "") AS establishment, dept.dept_id, NVL(dept.dept_name, "") AS department, fud.use_id AS user_id, NVL(u.user_name, "") AS user, NVL(g.grade_name, "") AS grade, NVL(p.position_name, "") AS position from (SELECT * FROM form_use_department WHERE form_code=#{code}) fud LEFT JOIN organization_user AS ou ON fud.category IN ('U') AND fud.use_id=ou.org_user_id LEFT JOIN department AS dept ON (fud.category IN ('D') AND (fud.use_id=dept.dept_id)) OR (fud.category IN ('U') AND (ou.dept_id=dept.dept_id)) LEFT JOIN establishment AS est ON (fud.category IN ('E') AND (fud.use_id=est.est_id)) OR (fud.category IN ('U', 'D') AND (dept.est_id=est.est_id)) LEFT JOIN company AS comp ON (fud.category IN ('C') AND (fud.use_id=comp.comp_id)) OR (fud.category IN ('U', 'D', 'E') AND (est.comp_id=comp.comp_id)) LEFT JOIN user AS u ON ou.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN grade AS g on ou.grade_code=g.grade_code LEFT JOIN position AS p on ou.position_code=p.position_code;

select distinct t1.form_code, form_name, form_explain, form_approval_kind from form t1 left join form_use_department t2 on t1.form_code = t2.form_code where ((t2. category = 'U' and use_id = #{belong.orgUserId}) or (t2.category = 'D' and use_id = #{belong.deptId}) or (t2.category = 'D' and use_id = #{belong.lowerDeptId}) or (t2.category = 'E' and use_id = #{belong.estId}) or (t2.category = 'C' and use_id =#{belong.compId})) and t1.form_used_status = 1 and t1.form_del_status = 0 and form_name like concat('%',#{searchContent},'%');

select distinct t1.seq_code, seq_name as name, t3.status as status, t3.use_id as use_id from sequence t1 left join sequence_use_form t2 on t1.seq_code = t2.seq_code left join sequence_use_department t3 on t3.seq_code = t2.seq_code where form_code = #{formCode} and seq_del_status = 0;

select distinct t1.seq_code, seq_name as name, t3.status as status, t3.use_id as use_id from sequence t1 left join sequence_use_form t2 on t1.seq_code = t2.seq_code left join sequence_use_department t3 on t3.seq_code = t2.seq_code where form_code =#{formCode} and ((t3. status = 'U' and use_id = #{belong.orgUserId}) or (t3.status = 'D' and use_id = #{belong.deptId}) or (t3.status = 'D' and use_id = #{belong.lowerDeptId}) or (t3.status = 'E' and use_id = #{belong.estId}) or (t3.status = 'C' and use_id =#{belong.compId})) and seq_del_status = 0 and t3.seq_code = #{seqCode};
select form_list_code, form_list_name, form_list_tag from form_list
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO form(comp_id, form_name, default_form, main_form, form_used_status, form_explain, default_approval_line_status, form_approval_kind) VALUES(#{compId}, #{formName}, #{defaultForm}, #{mainForm}, #{status}, #{formExplain}, #{approvalLineStatus}, #{approvalKind});
INSERT INTO form_use_department(category, form_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{formCode}, #{useId});
mapper.update: UPDATE form SET form_name = #{formName}, default_form = #{defaultForm}, main_form = #{mainForm}, form_used_status = #{status}, form_explain = #{formExplain}, default_approval_line_status=#{approvalLineStatus}, form_approval_kind=#{approvalKind} WHERE form_code = #{code}
mapper.delete: delete from form_use_department where category=#{category} and form_code = #{formCode} and use_id = #{useId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO form_use_department(category, form_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{formCode}, #{useId});
mapper.update: UPDATE form SET form_del_status=1 WHERE form_code = #{code}
mapper.select: select form_code AS id, form_name from form;

SELECT dl.line_order, dl.org_user_id AS userId, comp.comp_id, ou.comp_name, est.est_id, est.est_name, ou.dept_id, dept.dept_name, u.user_name, grade.grade_code, position.position_code, grade.grade_name, position.position_name FROM (SELECT * FROM default_approval_line WHERE form_code=#{code}) AS dl INNER JOIN organization_user AS ou ON dl.org_user_id=ou.org_user_id INNER JOIN department AS dept ON ou.dept_id=dept.dept_id INNER JOIN establishment AS est ON dept.est_id=est.est_id INNER JOIN company AS comp ON comp.comp_id=est.comp_id INNER JOIN user AS u ON u.user_id=ou.user_id INNER JOIN position on ou.position_code=position.position_code INNER JOIN grade on grade.grade_code=ou.grade_code ORDER BY dl.line_order;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM default_approval_line WHERE form_code=#{formCode} AND org_user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT form_code AS id, form_name FROM form WHERE comp_id = #{compId} AND form_del_status = 0;
select count(*) AS count from sequence_use_form where form_code=#{code};
